summary: Neville Kenneth Wran, AC, CNZM, QC  was an Australian politician and lawyer.
full_text: Neville Kenneth Wran AC CNZM QC  was the Premier of New South Wales from 1976 to 1986. He was the national president of the Australian Labor Party  from 1980 to 1986 and chairman of both the Lionel Murphy Foundation and the Commonwealth Scientific and Industrial Research Organisation  from 1986 to 1991.
title: Neville Wran
